tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FaceFeature (
    feature_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    face_id INT,
    feature_data BYTEA,
    feature_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (face_id) REFERENCES FaceImage(face_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FaceMatch (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query_face_id INT,
    match_face_id INT,
    match_similarity FLOAT,
    match_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (query_face_id) REFERENCES FaceImage(face_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (match_face_id) REFERENCES FaceImage(face_id)
);

CREATE TABLE facial_recognition_data (
    id INT,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    image BLOB,
    encoding VARCHAR(100),
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

CREATE TABLE face_matches (
    match_id INT,
    image1_id INT,
    image2_id INT,
    match_score FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (match_id)
)

CREATE TABLE face_embeddings (
    embedding_id INT,
    image_id INT,
    embedding_data BLOB,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (embedding_id)
)

CREATE TABLE image_metadata (
    image_id INT,
    filename VARCHAR(100),
    capture_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (image_id)
)

CREATE TABLE face_labels (
    label_id INT,
    image_id INT,
    label VARCHAR(50),
    confidence FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (label_id)
)
